name: Apex Direct Search
tag_list: recruiting, human-resources, los-angeles, digital-media, online, technology, software, ecommerce, seo, sem, web-2-0, wireless, mobile, content, streaming, iptv
description: recruiters for digital media & tech co's
overview: Apex Direct Search, Inc. recruits for digital media and technology companies in California since 1996. Apex recruiters have expertise in placing most functions including sales, marketing, information technology management, finance, accounting, business development, engineering, product management, legal, and other roles specific to the digital industry. Apex recruiters place professional through VP roles. The firm also has success in placing CMOs, CFOs, or CTOs for clients looking for an alternative to retained search. Apex works mainly on contingency. Apex recruiters are known for their targeted research capabilities in addition to extensive referral networks.
